fko.chessly.player.computer.FluxEngine

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • fko.chessly.player.computer.FluxEngine.Piece

  • final class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a chessman as a int value. The fields are represented by the following bits.

    0 - 2: the type (required)
    3: the color (required)

      • createPromotion

        static int createPromotion(int chessman,
                           int color)
        Get the piece for the promotion from GenericChessman and GenericColor. We do not set the position here, as we do not know the position yet.
        Parameters:
        chessman - the chessman.
        color - the color.
        Returns:
        the promotion piece.
